LightningComponentBundle.description: LWC that provides AI assistant capabilities for any record

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Component Title
property.description: The title displayed on the component card

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary theme color for the component (hex format: #RRGGBB)

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Accent color for the component (hex format: #RRGGBB)

property.name: defaultModelName
property.label: Default AI Model
property.description: DeveloperName of the default AI model to use (leave empty to allow user selection)

property.name: hideModelSelector
property.label: Hide Model Selector
property.description: Set to true to hide the model selector dropdown

property.name: contextPrompt
property.label: Assistant Context
property.description: Custom context about where/how this assistant is being used (e.g., 'You are an assistant on the Investigations app home page and should focus on helping with case management')

property.name: enableAnomalyDetection
property.label: Enable Anomaly Detection
property.description: Set to true to enable automatic anomaly detection for this record

property.name: relatedObjects
property.label: Related Objects
property.description: Comma-separated list of object API names to search across for related data (e.g., 'Account,Contact,Opportunity')
